db:info.db:title: AfterRequest Example
db:info.db:titleabbrev: Qt Lightweight HTTP Server Reference Documentation

db:abstract.db:para: Example of the usage of afterRequest().

db:article.db:programlisting:
requires(qtHaveModule(httpserver))
TEMPLATE = app
QT = httpserver
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/httpserver/afterrequest INSTALLS += target
CONFIG += cmdline
